summary: Returns information about a package, including handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider information
description:
Returns information about a package, including handover time slot, tracking number, and shipping provider information.​ Version
202309
  
API Testing Tool
​

query.description: Use this property to pass shop information in requesting the API. Failure in passing the correct value when requesting the API for cross-border shops will return incorrect response. ​ Get by API Get Authorization Shop​
Every single app will have a unique key. Please use the specific key assigned to your app.​
Signature generated by gen algorithm. When you send API requests to TTS, you must sign them so that TTS can identify the senders. ​
Unix timestamp GMT (UTC+00:00). This timestamp is used across all API requests. Developers can use this convert to local time.​

header.description: The seller access_token value from Get Access Token, when user_type = 0. Follow this guide to get seller access_token.​

schema.description: The success or failure status code returned in API response.​
The success or failure messages returned in API response. Reasons of failure will be described in the message.​

children.description: TikTok Shop package ID.​ ​
The response list of TikTok Shop orders.​
TikTok Shop order ID.​
SKU information.​
SKU ID.​
SKU name. ​
SKU image in order snapshot.​
SKU quantity.​

Possible values:​ - PROCESSING: Package has been arranged by seller. Waiting for carrier to collect the parcel.​ - FULFILLING: Package has been collected by carrier and in transit.​ - COMPLETED: Package has been delivered.​ - CANCELLED: Package has been canceled. Normally, the package is canceled due to the package being lost or damaged.​

Possible values:​ - DEFAULT: The package has not undergone any combine or split operation.​ - COMBINE: The package has been consolidated with another order.​ - SPLIT: The order has been split into multiple orders.​
Whether there are multiple SKU IDs in a package.​
Possible values:​ - BUYER_UNNOTED: The order has not been noted by buyer.​ - BUYER_NOTED: The order has been noted by buyer.​ ​
Package shipping provider name.​
Package shipping provider ID.​

The method of delivery. ​ Possible values:​ - TIKTOK: Shipping service provided by TikTok. The seller should obtain a shipping label from TikTok.​ - SELLER: Seller provides shipping, including through 3rd party fulfillment providers on behalf of the seller. ​
Delivery option name. For display purposes only.​
Order delivery option ID. Delivery option ID is mapped to seller configured logistics templates ID.​
Package tracking number.​
For cross-border order only. Cross-border order last mile tracking number.​ ​
Time slots available for pickup.​
Start of the time slot when a package is scheduled to be picked up by carrier. Unix timestamp.​
End of time slot when a package is scheduled to be picked up by carrier. Unix timestamp.​
Package creation time. Unix timestamp.​

Whether the package is delivered by pick up or drop off. Possible values:​ - PICKUP: A Logistics carrier will pickup the package(s) from the seller's pickup address.​ - DROP_OFF: Seller will need to drop off the package(s) to a designated location.​
The order line item ID contained in the package.​
Recipient address.​ ​
The complete recipient addresses information.​ ​
The telephone number of the buyer. Please note, if this order use platform logistics, phone number will be desensitized.​
The name of the recipient. Please note, if this order uses platform logistics, recipient name will be desensitized​
The postal code that can be used by seller for shipping (in the U.S, this refers to the ZIP code).​
Full buyer detail address.​
Region code.​
The first line of the street address​
The second line of the street address.​
The third line of the street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.​
The fourth line of the street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.​
Sender address.​
The complete sender addresses information.​
The telephone number of the sender. ​
The name of the sender.​
The postal code of the sender.​
Full sender detail address.​
Region code of the sender.​
The first line of the sender's street address.​
The second line of the sender's street address.​
The third line of the sender's street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.​
The fourth line of the sender's street address. Usually only for the Brazilian market.​
The weight of the scheduled package.​
The value of the weight of the scheduled package.​
The unit of measurement used to measure the weight. Possible values:​ - GRAM​ - POUND​
The dimensions of the scheduled package.​
The length of the scheduled package. ​
The width of the scheduled package. ​
The height of the scheduled package. ​
The unit of measurement used to measure the length. Possible values:​ - CM​ - INCH​
The time the package has been updated. Unix timestamp.​
Provides details of shipping insurance auto-enrolled during label purchase​
Whether insurance has been purchased for the package.​
The insurance coverage amount for the package. Units: USD.​
Whether the order is eligible for an insurance claim, based on eligible refund reasons.​

The insurance claim status.​ Available values:​ - NOT_STARTED: Claim has not been initiated for this package.​ - CLAIM_PENDING: Claim is currently under review.​ - APPROVED: Claim has been approved.​ - DECLINED: Claim has been declined.​

error_codes.message: Permission denied, please contact the platform for assistance.​
System process error, please try again later.​
